import React,{useState} from 'react'; const CoustomerData = () => { const [bal1,setBal1]=useState(2000); const [bal2,setBal2]=useState(3000); const [bal3,setBal3]=useState(4000); const inputHandeler = (event)=>{ console.log(event.target.value); console.log(bal1); setBal1(bal1-Number(event.target.value)) setBal2(bal2+Number(event.target.value)) } return (

Balance

trandfer from person1 to person2

Firstname Lastname Balance
John Doe {bal1}
Mary Moe {bal2}
July Dooley {bal3}
) } export default CoustomerData;
